name: FNF - Vs. Matt Boxing Fight
description:
A playable version of Chino's Animated's animation.

Might wanna click the SD Card after you're done with the week.

TUTORIAL: 

RNG (Blue and orange) notes can be enabled and disabled in settings.

Orange notes remove shield if hit.

Blue notes give shield if hit, and remove extra shield if missed.

Missing a note will remove half of a shield bar. To restore it, press space 5 times.

Press E to dodge when you miss a note.

When the stamina bar (the blue bar on the right,) is full, press Z to gain:

Bonus Shield

Invincibility

Nothing lol

Death (Removes most of your shield bars)
Blue and Orange notes are randomized
By the way, you might need your dodge for something else...
